about_paragraph1: Nowadays, I am in an active job search process in the software development industry, intending to develop my skills to the top and become a top professional. I would love to put all of my effort and knowledge at the service of the company that hired me
about_paragraph2: With the intention of learn and increase my skills, I developed the web site{' '}www.incipiosrl.com.uy, my portfolio{' '}www.uyucode.net{' '}with it's documentation site{' '}www.uyucode.net/en/documentation/matemagics{' '}as well as several web apps, which can be used online on my portfolio.{' '}

developed.name: Incipio Srl website

developed.name: Chat

developed.name: Curriculum
developed.description: This curricum was developed on React and accepts translations to any language. The source code is at github.

responsibilities: Develop and mantainance of the company's website.
Mantainance, repairment and diagnosis of automation equipments.
Installation of computer equipment and networks on the company offices.
Installation of alarm and video surveillance systems.
Installation and mantainance of fire fighting systems, including 1.500 meters of tubes and more than 15 fire hydrants.
